content:
IWithCreateAndAccessTier Interface

Definition

A storage account definition allowing access tier to be set.

In this Article

public interface IWithCreateAndAccessTier : Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.Resource.Definition.IDefinitionWithTags<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.StorageAccount.Definition.IWithCreate>, Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.ResourceActions.ICreatable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.IStorageAccount>, Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.StorageAccount.Definition.IWithCreate

Methods

WithAccessTier(AccessTier)
